activities: Personal information is received from meeting registration websites, manual registration forms and telephone by clients, individual client employees, Meeting Management companies and other travel industry related sources.  Information collected is used to complete the individuals/groups requested travel reservations - air, transfers, hotels, etc.  Personal information is retained by DePrez and may be accessed by the airlines, clients and financial intermediaries involved in the transactions
contactoff1: The DePrez Group Of Travel Companies
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
